Desc.entry: Pamela Marshall offers small, friendly classes for drawing and painting (mainly watercolour techniques) using a variety of subjects. Separate classes for adults and children aged 7 to 14 years. Classes are small and friendly with a maximum number of 10 children. Classes include painting and drawing for fun using paints, pencils and crayons. Can also work with community art groups and school art groups on community projects. Special holiday and outdoor landscape classes in the summer. Can offer one-to-one tuition. Demonstrations on watercolours, acrylics and drawing techniques are also available.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Tues & Wed 7-9pm (adult classes), Thurs 10am-12noon (adult beginners' classes), Thurs 6.30-8pm (children's classes)
